Message:
There’re so many things
I wanna tell ya, Miss Val.

I’d like to think I survived
this far on my own,
but in reality, I was saved
by a lotta people.

Without ’em, I wouldn’t have
made it this far.

And ever since I met ya,
I’ve felt as if I can live life
to the fullest, even in this
crappy world.

If there’s anyone like you,
or the people that saved me
out there, then this world
ain’t that bad.

This is our world, and I don’t
wanna lose any of it!

Then the flames died down...
But before they could flare up
again, the lord and I quickly
headed towards Miss Val.

She kept mutterin’
the word “hate,”
but I definitely heard
somethin’ else—

“Someone, save me...”
Miss Val, I knew it...
